member.name: T:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.Increment(ApplicationMetrics.CountMetric)

member.param: The count metric that occurred.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.Add(ApplicationMetrics.AmountMetric)

member.param: The amount metric that occurred.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricLogger.Set(ApplicationMetrics.StatusMetric)

member.param: The status metric that occurred.

member.name: T:ApplicationMetrics.IExceptionHandler
member.summary: Defines a method to handle Exceptions. When injected into an object, this allows exceptions thrown by worker threads in the object to be captured outside the object. Useful for test frameworks like NMock2 which do not capture exceptions on worker threads.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IExceptionHandler.Handle(System.Exception)
member.param: The exception to handle.

member.name: T:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricAggregateLogger
member.summary: Defines methods to register aggregates of metric events, allowing the values of these aggregates to be recorded and logged when the underlying metric events occur.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricAggregateLogger.DefineMetricAggregate(ApplicationMetrics.CountMetric,ApplicationMetrics.TimeUnit,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Defines a metric aggregate which represents the number of occurrences of a count metric within the specified time unit.
member.remarks: This metric aggregate could be used to represent the number of messages sent to a remote system each minute, or the number of disk reads per second.
member.param: The count metric recorded as part of the aggregate.
The unit of time in which the number of occurrences of the count metric is recorded.
The name of the metric aggregate.
A description of the metric aggregate, explaining what it measures and/or represents.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricAggregateLogger.DefineMetricAggregate(ApplicationMetrics.AmountMetric,ApplicationMetrics.CountMetric,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Defines a metric aggregate which represents the total amount of the specified amount metric per occurrence of the specified count metric.
member.remarks: This metric aggregate could be used to represent the number of bytes per message sent to a remote system, or the number of bytes read per disk read.
member.param: The amount metric recorded as part of the aggregate (effectively the numerator).
The count metric per which the total amount of the amount metric(s) are aggregated (effectively the denominator).
The name of the metric aggregate.
A description of the metric aggregate, explaining what it measures and/or represents.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricAggregateLogger.DefineMetricAggregate(ApplicationMetrics.AmountMetric,ApplicationMetrics.TimeUnit,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Defines a metric aggregate which represents the total amount of the specified amount metric within the specified time unit.
member.remarks: This metric aggregate could be used to represent the number of bytes sent to a remote system each minute, or the number of bytes read from disk per second.
member.param: The amount metric recorded as part of the aggregate.
The unit of time in which the amount associated with the specified amount metric is recorded.
The name of the metric aggregate.
A description of the metric aggregate, explaining what it measures and/or represents.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricAggregateLogger.DefineMetricAggregate(ApplicationMetrics.AmountMetric,ApplicationMetrics.AmountMetric,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Defines a metric aggregate which represents the ratio of one amount metric to another.
member.remarks: This metric aggregate could be used to represent the size of a compressed file against the size of the same file uncompressed, effectively recording the overall compression ratio.
member.param: The amount metric which is the numerator in the ratio.
The amount metric which is the denominator in the ratio.
The name of the metric aggregate.
A description of the metric aggregate, explaining what it measures and/or represents.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricAggregateLogger.DefineMetricAggregate(ApplicationMetrics.IntervalMetric,ApplicationMetrics.CountMetric,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Defines a metric aggregate which represents the total time of the specified interval metric per occurrence of the specified count metric.
member.remarks: This metric aggregate could be used to represent the average time to send a message to a remote system, or the average time to read perform a disk read.
member.param: The interval metric recorded as part of the aggregate (effectively the numerator).
The count metric per which the total time of the interval metric(s) are aggregated (effectively the denominator).
The name of the metric aggregate.
A description of the metric aggregate, explaining what it measures and/or represents.

member.name: M:ApplicationMetrics.IMetricAggregateLogger.DefineMetricAggregate(ApplicationMetrics.IntervalMetric,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Defines a metric which represents the total time of all occurrences of the specified interval metric as a fraction of the total runtime of the logger.
member.remarks: This metric aggregate could be used to represent the percentage of total runtime spent sending messages to a remote system.
member.param: The interval metric recorded as part of the aggregate.
The name of the metric aggregate.
A description of the metric aggregate, explaining what it measures and/or represents.
